Sasori uses his [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|Third Kazekage]] [[human puppet]] to create a Giant Hammer made of [[Iron Sand]] and drops it on the opponent.

== Trivia ==

* Though unnamed in the manga and anime, this technique is named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3]]''.
